ul.li: Data mining within the elements TEI ➞ body ➞ div

Attributes values:
Traditionally proposed in XML-TEI: structuralUnit
for structural unit of the preparation to a hermeneutics: Event|perform|who|behav|occasion|where|how

conbody.p:
Structural unit of the interpretation according to taxonomies:
<interpGrp resp="#Juloux" xml:id="hermeneutics" type="structuralUnit" ana="#taxonomies"> <!-- ref --> <interp n="1" xml:id="perform" ana="#primaryData #objectiveData #verb #semantic">What performance</interp> <!-- castList > castItem --> <interp n="2" xml:id="who" ana="#Character #primaryData #Genetic-sex">Animated entity</interp> <interp n="3" xml:id="behav" ana="#role #objectiveData">What behavior</interp> <!-- view --> <interp n="4" xml:id="occasion" ana="#context">What occasion</interp> <interp n="5" xml:id="where" ana="#objectiveData #sphere">Where</interp> <!-- stage --> <interp n="6" xml:id="how" ana="#subjectiveData">How acts the animated entity</interp> </interpGrp>
